name: Mobile Magnet Parkour
description:
Mobile magnet parkour was made in about 3 hours for Trijam #189: The 3 hour game jam

In this game, currently more of a (physics) tech demo, you must move through the level using a giant magnet. Aim at a metal object (the shipping containers and cranes) and use the magnet. However, the magnet can only push and pull you around. Can you parkour your way to the end of the level?

Hope you enjoy the magnet motion!

Controls: 

- Aim with the mouse

- Left mouse button starts pulling

- Right mouse button starts pushing
